name: LinkplaySmartCharger
0:
”Alexa, ask Smart Charger to navigate to home.”
”Alexa, ask Smart Charger to call Kimi.”
”Alexa, ask Smart Charger to go to the company.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart charger
des:
Free hand to navigate and call by Linkplay Smart Charger.

Here's a step by step guide:
(1). Search the Alexa Skills directory for "Linkplay Smart Charger";
(2). Click Enable skill of "Linkplay Smart Charger ", then input your account username, password on the linking page;
(3). Now all setup is done. Try talk to Bluetooth device for navigating to some place or calling somebody.

Here are the voice commands for Smart Charger:

* Alexa, ask smart charger to go home.
* Alexa, ask smart charger to go to the company.
* Alexa, ask smart charger to call Kimi.
* Alexa, ask smart charger, navigate to the closest starbucks.
* Alexa, ask smart charger, navigate to railway station.
* Alexa, ask smart charger to go to 370 convention way, Redwood city.
